ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The Amapá Foundation for Research Support (FAPEAP). To the Research Program for SUS—PPSUS—Ministry of Health. The Coordination of Improvement of Higher Education Personnel (CAPES)/Ministry of Education (MEC). The National Council for Scientific and Technological Development-CNPQ. To the Laboratory of Microbiology (LEMA) under the responsibility of Prof. Aldo Proietti Aparecido Júnior. The Federal University of Amapá—UNIFAP. Pro-rector of research and post-graduation—PROPESPG.
